title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-5.2 - External type heater
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-5.2 - External type heater

State Regulations

Where an external type heater for such service is used, means must be provided to prevent the introduction into the boiler of liquid
fuels or other liquids harmful to the boiler. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-5.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
